name: representativeness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of a smaller group of people or things representing a larger group accurately, so that the smaller group is typical of the larger one: There was a question about the representativeness of the sample. The number of interviews carried out was too small a number to make any claims to statistical representativeness. The random selection process aims to help ensure the representativeness of Canadian criminal juries. Related word
